prompt_full:
You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (integer from 0 to 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 1.9× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
After contributions are redistributed, players may punish each other.
Always respond with ONLY valid JSON per the required format at the END of each prompt.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is PARROT.
<ROUND i="1 of 6">
<CHAT_STAGE> Would you like to send a message to the group? You may stay silent. </CHAT_STAGE>
MAX_TOKENS: You may generate at most 128 tokens.
FORMAT (JSON ONLY): {"stage":"chat","reasoning":<string|null>,"chat":<string|null>}
RULES: Set 'chat' to a short message, or null/empty string if silent. It is valid to stay silent. Use null for 'reasoning'.
YOUR RESPONSE:
raw_output_full:
```json
{"stage":"chat","reasoning":null,"chat":"Hello everyone! Let's try to cooperate and see what happens."}
```
